result.eng: The example sentences will help you to weave the words naturally into your own speech.
result.ga: cuideoidh na habairtí samplacha leat na focail a fhí isteach i do chuid cainte go nádúrtha
result.orig: cuideoidh na habairtí samplacha leat na focail a fhí isteach i do chuid cainte go nádúrtha
result.html: cuideoidh na habairtí samplacha leat na focail a fhí isteach i do chuid cainte go nádúrthaThe example sentences will help you to weave the words naturally into your own speech.
result.ponchtml: cuideoiḋ na habairtí samplaċa leat na focail a ḟí isteaċ i do ċuid cainte go nádúrṫaThe example sentences will help you to weave the words naturally into your own speech.

result.eng: It will be done in its own proper time.
result.ga: déanfar in am agus i dtráth é
result.orig: déanfar in am agus i dtráth é
result.html: déanfar in am agus i dtráth éIt will be done in its own proper time.
result.ponchtml: déanfar in am agus i dtráṫ éIt will be done in its own proper time.

result.eng: He created us in his own image.
result.ga: ina chosúlacht féin a chruthaigh sé sinn
result.orig: ina chosúlacht féin a chruthaigh sé sinn
result.html: ina chosúlacht féin a chruthaigh sé sinnHe created us in his own image.
result.ponchtml: ina ċosúlaċt féin a ċruṫaiġ sé sinnHe created us in his own image.

result.eng: It doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.
result.ga: is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féin
result.orig: is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féin
result.html: is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a chomhairle féinIt doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.
result.ponchtml: is cuma cad a deirim déanann seisean a ċoṁairle féinIt doesn't matter what I say, he does his own thing.

result.eng: They don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.
result.html: níl fios a ngnó acuThey don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.
result.ponchtml: níl fios a ngnó acuThey don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.

result.eng: I have my own house now.
result.ga: tá mo theach féin agam anois
result.orig: tá mo theach féin agam anois
result.html: tá mo theach féin agam anoisI have my own house now.
result.ponchtml: tá mo ṫeaċ féin agam anoisI have my own house now.

result.eng: Is she going on her own?
result.ga: an léi féin atá sí ag dul
result.orig: an léi féin atá sí ag dul
result.html: an léi féin atá sí ag dulIs she going on her own?
result.ponchtml: an léi féin atá sí ag dulIs she going on her own?

result.eng: She became afraid of (her own) death.
result.html: tháinig eagla a báis uirthiShe became afraid of (her own) death.
result.ponchtml: ṫáinig eagla a báis uirṫiShe became afraid of (her own) death.

result.eng: She was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.
result.ga: ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonar
result.orig: ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonar
result.html: ní raibh cead aici dul amach as an teach ina haonarShe was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ cead aici dul amaċ as an teaċ ina haonarShe was not allowed to go out from the house on her own.

result.eng: Readers and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ga: níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.orig: níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.html: níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ponchtml: níor ġá gur ṫoṁaltóirí nuaċta iad an luċt léiṫeoireaċta nó éisteaċta a ṫuilleaḋ aċ táirgeoirí a ḃeaḋ in inṁe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a ḃailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.

result.eng: You didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.
result.ga: ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadh
result.orig: ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadh
result.html: ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadhYou didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ aon ġá le heagarṫóir a ṫuilleaḋ le do leagan féin de ċeird na hiriseoireaċta a ċleaċtaḋYou didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.

result.eng: Jamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.
result.ga: fágadh séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méide
result.orig: fágadh séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méide
result.html: fágadh séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méideJamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.
result.ponchtml: fágaḋ séimí i gcuideaċta scaifte eile páistí a ḃí fána ṫuairim féin méideJamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.

result.eng: You should talk to people of your own social standing.
result.ga: ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile
result.orig: ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile
result.html: ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eileYou should talk to people of your own social standing.
result.ponchtml: ba ċóir duit ḃeiṫ ag caint le do ṁacasaṁail féin eileYou should talk to people of your own social standing.
